comments:
The bug is no 100% reproduceable.
When opening a file for editing, there is sometimes the following exception is thrown:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)
at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.next(Unknown Source)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.parser.PHPUserModel.getVariableType(PHPUserModel.java:415)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.phpElementData.PHPFileDataUtilities.getVariableType(PHPFileDataUtilities.java:137)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.parser.DefaultParserClient.getClassName(DefaultParserClient.java:606)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.parser.DefaultParserClient.fixObjectInstantiation(DefaultParserClient.java:568)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.parser.DefaultParserClient.finishParsing(DefaultParserClient.java:468)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.parser.ParserClientComposite.finishParsing(ParserClientComposite.java:187)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.parser.PhpParserSchedulerTask$ParserExecuter.run(PhpParserSchedulerTask.java:211)
at org.eclipse.php.core.phpModel.parser.PhpParserSchedulerTask.run(PhpParserSchedulerTask.java:74)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
